name: Wanderlust (itch) (Nyco is dreaming)
description:
An early prototype of a platformer metroidvania

Controls:

Move = WASD/Arrow keys

Jump = Space/Up

Attack = X, F, J

Dash = Shift/Control

A 3 week (mostly) solo project, still in development! :) 

Music & sound by my friend Benjamin Neweklowsky

Characters & props from the asset-store
